ygData.subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Advice needed
ygData.msgSnippet: hi, I have a 30th level enchanter galadriana . mes uses conjuration as does casting your pet.. i never used my pet much as there was no need for it really..
ygData.messageBody:
hi,
I have a 30th level enchanter galadriana . mes uses conjuration as does
casting your pet.. i never used my pet much as there was no need for it
really.. but at 29 when i got group mes, much to my surprise, my conjuration
skills were so low, from never using it, that mes fizzled almost every time,
so now when i get time i just go to a safe area and mes everything in sight
to get my conjuration skills up.. so my advice it to cast your pet and your
mes as much as possible, so when you get higher and need the group mes spell
in order to fight in a dungeon or wherever, it will work and not fizzle,
because it can cost alot of lives if the timings not good and you fizzle
alot...

Joyce
